item.title: wrote japanese
item.description: 11:56 Friday 19 January 2018 JST Thanks to https://mothereff.in/html-entities and https://japaneseemoticons.me/crying-emoticons/ for helping write the Japanese entry. But man it took 2.5 hours to write. I hope someone (including possibly future me) appreciates it! What’s amazing is that when writing this entry, I actually overwrote the other entry because I originally named this entry “studied japanese”. Thank Emacs for saving a backup copy before the overwrite happened.
